```{r}
dev.new(width = 5, height = 5); par(mar = c(2, 2, 2, 2))

cols <- rep('gray', 6); cols[5] <- 'green'
lines(metadata(se)$curves, lwd = 3, show.constraints = TRUE, col = cols)
```
